title: Americano
description: With a similar taste to black coffee, the Americano consists of an espresso shot diluted with hot water.

title: Espresso
description: An espresso shot can be served alone or used as the basis for most coffee drinks, such as latte and macchiato.

title: Mocha
description: For all the chocolate lovers out there, you will fall in love with a mocha. Mocha is a chocolate espresso drink with steamed milk and foam.

title: Hot Chocolate
description: On cold winter days, a cup of hot chocolate makes you feel cozy and happy. It also makes you feel good because it contains energizing caffeine.

title: Chai Latte
description: If you're looking for a tasty hot drink in the middle of winter, choose a chai latte. The combination of cardamom and cinnamon gives it a wonderful flavor.

title: Matcha Latte
description: Matcha latte is a green, healthy coffee drink with finely crushed matcha tea and milk, offering mild sweetness, a unique flavor and a mild caffeine boost.

title: Seasonal Brew
description: Seasonal coffee with different flavors such as caramel, fruit and chocolate

title: Svart Tea
description: Black tea originated in China. It is made from the leaves of a plant called Camellia and can be flavored with fruits for example. A pleasant, warm, flavorful and aromatic drink that is suitable for everyday use.

title: Ice Latte
description: Iced latte is a chilled coffee drink made by mixing espresso and chilled milk. It is served with ice cubes and is also known as caf√® latte iced or latte on the rocks.

title: Ice Latte Mocha
description: Iced latte Mocha is a combination of latte and mocha, which itself is a combination of chocolate and coffee. It gives cold drink lovers a delicious chocolate and coffee experience.

title: Frapino Caramel
description: It's a blended or better said shaken coffee with whipped cream on top. A must for hot summer days.

title: Frapino Mocka
description: Another famous and delicious cold drink for those who prefer chocolate. Imagine the taste of a shake with chocolate and whipped cream on top.

title: Latte Amaretto
description: A latte with amaretto flavored syrup
You can even eat tea,it is more delicious than coffee
